actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the use of depositions in connection with an impeachment inquiry of the Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on the Judiciary or its Subcommittee on Criminal Justice to take affidavits and depositions in connection with the impeachment inquiry about United States District Judge Alcee L. Hastings.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the use of depositions in connection with an impeachment inquiry of the Committee on the Judiciary.
